014package org.jdbi.v3.sqlobject;
015
016import java.lang.reflect.Method;
017
018/**
019 * Decorates Handler objects with additional behavior.
020 *
021 * @see SqlMethodDecoratingAnnotation
022 * @see HandlerDecorators
023 */
024@FunctionalInterface
025public interface HandlerDecorator {
026    /**
027     * Decorates the {@link Handler} to add or substitute behavior on the given SQL Object method. Implementations may
028     * alternatively return the base handler, e.g. if the conditions for applying a particular decoration are not met.
029     *
030     * @param base          the base handler to decorate
031     * @param sqlObjectType the SQL Object type
032     * @param method        the method to be decorated
033     * @return the base handle, or a decorated handler (depending on the decorator implementation).
034     */
035    Handler decorateHandler(Handler base, Class<?> sqlObjectType, Method method);
036}
